name: Poop'em All !!
description:
Prototype finished in some days to learn :)

Press Arrows or AWSD to move, 

Press Space to poop!

Avoid the objects the people throw at you (unless you want to die :(  )

Music from Menu and from the Stage 1 (actually, the only stage right now)

Awake!(Megawall-10)- by cynicmusic

Happy Arcade Tune - by rezoner

You just need to download the offline version and launch Pidgeon Attack (placeholder name when i was developing) and have fun!
